name: rewear
description: ReWear is an innovative sustainable fashion exchange platform designed to combat fast fashion waste and promote circular economy principles in the clothing industry. The platform enables users to exchange pre-owned clothing items while actively tracking and visualizing their positive environmental impact.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd Server && npm install && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../Client && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run ml" "npm run frontend"

author: Scout Regiment
